content:
WITH TENSIONS rising in the South China Sea, we consider how a potential clash between America And China might play out—And why the world should pay more attention to the region. And host Tom StAndage takes a ride in a self-driving car in London, to see how Europe is faring in the race to build autonomous vehicles. Runtime: 22 min

Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneIn

apple sauce

a garden with three apple trees

They really are apples and oranges.
他们确实是迥然不同。
They are both great but you can't compare apples and oranges .
他们俩都很棒，但是截然不同，无法比较。
They really are apples and oranges.
他们确实是迥然不同。
They are both great but you can't compare apples and oranges .
他们俩都很棒，但是截然不同，无法比较。

ex: n. 海；海洋；大量；海面情况
abbr. (=
网络 大海；战略环境评价(Strategic Environmental Assessment)；统计能量分析(Statistical Energy Analysis)
eg2: to travel by sea
海上旅行
a cottage by the sea
海滨小屋
The waste was dumped in the sea .
废物倒入海中。
The wreck is lying at the bottom of the sea.
沉船躺在海底。
We left port and headed for the open sea(= far away from land) .
我们离开港口，向外海驶去。
the cold seas of the Arctic
北极地区寒冷的海洋
a sea voyage
海上航行
a hotel room with sea view
看得见大海的旅馆客房
the North Sea
北海
the Caspian Sea
里海
It was a calm sea.
海上风平浪静。
The sea was very rough.
海上风急浪高。
He looked down at the sea of smiling faces before him.
他看着眼前这笑脸的海洋。

ex: n. 南；南方；南部；美国南方各州
adj. 南方的；向南的；南部的；南风的
adv. 向南；朝南；…以南；在…之南
v. 【天】(天体)向南走；越过子午线；转向南方
网络 南边；南面；南区
eg2: Which way is south?
哪边是南？
warmer weather coming from the south
自南至北渐暖的天气
He lives to the south of(= further south than) the city.
他住在城外南边。
birds flying to the south for the winter
飞往南方过冬的鸟
They bought a villa in the South of France.
他们在法国南部买了一座别墅。
Houses are less expensive in the North than in the South(= of England) .
（英格兰）北方的房子比南方便宜。
South Wales
南威尔士
They live on the south coast.
他们住在南海岸。
This room faces south.
这间房朝南。
They live ten miles south of Bristol.
他们居住在布里斯托尔以南十英里的地方。
The drug is achieving revenues just south of $1 billion per quarter.
药品每个季度的收益仅略低于 10 亿。
They've gone to live down south.
他们到南方去住了。
They've gone to live down south.
他们到南方去住了。

ex: n. 汤姆；雄性动物；(特指)雄猫；Thomas 的爱称
v. 〈美口〉(像汤姆叔一样)逆来顺受
网络 雄火鸡；张雨生；汤姆猫
eg2: We don't want any Tom, Dick or Harry using the club bar.
我们不想随便让什么人都来使用会所的酒吧。
We don't want any Tom, Dick or Harry using the club bar.
我们不想随便让什么人都来使用会所的酒吧。

ex: prep. 用；和；有；具有
网络 和…一起；带有；以
eg2: She lives with her parents.
她同父母住在一起。
I have a client with me right now.
我现在有个客户。
a nice steak with a bottle of red wine
一份美味牛排再加上一瓶红葡萄酒
a girl with(= who has) red hair
一位红发女郎
a jacket with a hood
带风帽的短上衣
He looked at her with a hurt expression.
他带着受伤害的神情看着她。
They're both in bed with flu.
他们双双患流感卧病在床。
a man with a suitcase
提衣箱的男子
Cut it with a knife.
用刀把它切开。
It is treated with acid before being analysed.
对它先用酸处理再进行分析。
The bag was stuffed with dirty clothes.
袋子里塞满了脏衣服。
Sprinkle the dish with salt.
在这盘菜上撒上盐。
to fight with sb
与某人打架
to play tennis with sb
与某人打网球
at war with a neighbouring country
与邻国交战
I had an argument with my boss.
我跟老板吵了一架。
Be careful with the glasses.
小心这些玻璃杯。
Are you pleased with the result?
你对结果满意吗？
Don't be angry with her.
别生她的气。
With these students it's pronunciation that's the problem.
对这些学生来说，成问题的是发音。
She won't be able to help us with all the family commitments she has.
她有这么多家务事，帮不了我们。
It's much easier compared with last time.
这与上次相比容易得多。
The meal with wine came to $20 each.
包括酒这顿饭每人 20 块钱。
With all the lesson preparation I have to do I work 12 hours a day.
加上必须的备课在内，我每天工作 12 个小时。
He behaved with great dignity.
他举止庄重威严。
She sleeps with the window open.
她爱开着窗户睡觉。
Don't stand with your hands in your pockets.
站着的时候别把双手插在口袋里。
She blushed with embarrassment.
她难为情得脸红了。
His fingers were numb with cold.
他的手指冻麻了。
The shadows lengthened with the approach of sunset.
随着太阳西沉，影子越来越长。
Skill comes with practice.
熟能生巧。
Marine mammals generally swim with the current.
海洋哺乳动物一般顺水而游。
The keys are with reception.
钥匙在服务台。
Leave it with me.
把这交给我吧。
She acted with a touring company for three years.
她在一巡回剧团里演出了三年。
I bank with HSBC.
我的钱存在汇丰银行里。
I could never part with this ring.
我永远也不摘掉这枚戒指。
Can we dispense with the formalities?
我们可以免去这些客套吗？
With all her faults I still love her.
尽管她有种种缺点，我依然爱着她。
Off to bed with you!
你给我睡觉去！
Down with school!
取缔学校！

ex: adj. 自治的；自主的；自发的

wp.Autonomous car: 自动驾驶汽车;无人驾驶汽车
wp.Autonomous Tariff: 自主关税;		自主税则;自动关税税则;固定税则
wp.autonomous operation: 自仲作;独立作战;		自主操作;自律操作
wp.Autonomous Maintenance: 自主维护;自主保全;动维护;自主维持
wp.autonomous block: 独立块;自律块;独立块英语
wp.autonomous expenditure: 自发支出;自发性支出;它们属于自生支出;自发性消费
wp.autonomous automaton: 自主自动机;自动自动机;自生自动机;自律自动机

eg2: EVERY day, we live under the spell of an illusion: that our conscious mind is , and in control of our bodies and decisions.
每天，我们都是在假象的阴影下生活，即：我们清醒的心智是自主的，在我们的身体和判断的掌控之中。
On the other hand, when we construct autonomous robots, I bet we give up some of their potential adaptability in exchange for preventing them from going off on their own beyond our full control.
另一方面，当我们制造自治的机器人时，我敢打赌，为了防止它们自作主张地脱离我们的完全控制，我们放弃了它们一些潜在的可适应能力。
There might be a market for inferential power like that, especially if it could be yoked to some of the  semi-intelligent agents that are already buzzing around on the Internet.
如果像那样的话，推论力也可能有市场，尤其是如果它能跟一些在互联网上已经流传开的、自发的半智能力量结合在一起时更可能有市场。

wp.Techno Clash: 狂突战士;超级棒球日美欧版
wp.Zeno Clash: 奇诺冲突;奇诺抵触;玩后的感想与简评;奇诺争辩
wp.The Clash: 冲撞乐队;冲击合唱团;碰撞乐队;撞击乐队

ex: n. 冲突，不协调；碰撞声，铿锵声
vi. 冲突，抵触；砰地相碰撞，发出铿锵声
vt. 使碰撞作声
eg2: It's a pity the two concerts ; I want to go to both.
可惜两个音乐会时间冲突， 我都想去听。
It seems that the armed clash is necessitated between the two countries.
看来两国间的军事冲突是不可避免的了。
The  in their relationship came when they neither wanted to leave their respective churches.
他们都不愿意脱离各自的教会,这使得他们的关系出现了冲突。

ex: v. 坐（sit的第三人称单数形式）
n. 坐（sit的复数）

wp.sits around: 坐在周围;坐在那里看;坐在

ex: n. 车辆；工具；交通工具
网络 媒介物；载体；运载工具
eg2: motor vehicles(= cars, buses, lorries/trucks, etc.)
机动车辆
Are you the driver of this vehicle?
你是这辆汽车的驾驶员吗？
rows of parked vehicles
一排排停放的车辆
Art may be used as a vehicle for propaganda.
艺术可以用作宣传的工具。
The play is an ideal vehicle for her talents.
这部戏是她施展才华的理想机会。

Title: The world ahead: clash of the titans

paperStatistics.title: The world ahead: clash of the titans
